LanguageData.FT_Sandbag.label: Military sandbag
LanguageData.FT_Sandbag.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as cover. More professional-looking than basic sandbags.

LanguageData.FT_Sandbag_Frame.label: Military Sandbag (building)
LanguageData.FT_Sandbag_Frame.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as cover. More professional-looking than basic sandbags.

LanguageData.FT_WallSandbag_Frame.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as wall.
LanguageData.FT_TankTrap.label: Tank trap
